files.README.md:
# Claude Code Marketplace

A marketplace for Claude Code plugins by sultano.

## Install

In a Claude Code session, run:

```
/plugin marketplace add sultano/claude-code-marketplace
```

## Available Plugins

| Plugin | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| [prompt-me-less](https://github.com/sultano/claude-code-prompt-me-less) | Auto-approves safe commands, prompts for others |

### Install a plugin

```
/plugin install prompt-me-less@sultano-plugins
```

plugins.name: prompt-me-less
